channel.title: PI Prayer Points Gaining
channel.description: Yes, most of you are thinking i'm a noob, but i can't seem to ind out how to make my prayer points go up with my prayer level, i've tried everything, usually what happens is it only goes up one point when i gain multiple levels, how do i fix this? I'm not sure what code to post, so please tell me what file i should post. eg. PlayerAssistant.java Prayer.Java Btw: i tried this under PlayerAssisstant.java where it says you level up i also put "c.playerLevel[5] += 1" i'm not sure if that would do anything but i tried many many things all ended in failure please respond

item.title: PI Prayer Points Gaining
item.dc:creator: @rodneyxr rodneyxr
item.description:
@rodneyxr wrote:

Yes, most of you are thinking i’m a noob, but i can’t seem to ind out how to make my prayer points go up with my prayer level, i’ve tried everything, usually what happens is it only goes up one point when i gain multiple levels, how do i fix this? I’m not sure what code to post, so please tell me what file i should post. eg. PlayerAssistant.java Prayer.Java
Btw: i tried this under PlayerAssisstant.java where it says you level up i also put “c.playerLevel[5] += 1” i’m not sure if that would do anything but i tried many many things all ended in failure please respond

Read full topic
